data.title: The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association
data.meta_description: In 2021, Mike Miller became an Assistant Coach for the Washington Wizards.
data.meta_site_name: The Official Website of The NBA Coaches Association |
data.text: In 2021, Mike Miller became an Assistant Coach for the Washington Wizards. Coach Miller was born in Monmouth, Illinois and graduated from East Texas State University. Coach Miller and his wife, Kelly, have two children (Matt & Joey).
